name.baseName: Electricity production ; Electricity ; Thermal power (70.7%) + hydropower (7.3%) + nuclear power (17.8%) + wind power (0.9%) + solar power (3.4%)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Forms of electricity generation include thermal power generation, hydropower generation, nuclear power generation, wind power generation and solar power generation.
电力产生形式包括火力发电、水力发电、核能发电、风力发电和太阳能发电

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Calculated based on data from the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook
根据2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算

technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described is for electricity production, and includes various methods such as thermal power, hydropower, nuclear power, wind power, and solar power generation. The distribution of the energy mix includes a significant proportion of thermal power (70.7%), followed by nuclear power (17.8%), hydropower (7.3%), solar power (3.4%), and wind power (0.9%). This electricity production mix is intended for general consumption, supplying energy to the grid for use in residential, commercial, industrial, and transport sectors.
所述工业过程用于电力生产，包括火力发电、水力发电、核能发电、风力发电和太阳能发电等多种方法。能源组合中较大比例为火力发电（70.7%），其次为核电（17.8%）、水电（7.3%）、太阳能发电（3.4%）和风力发电（0.9%）。这种电力生产组合意在供普遍消费，为居民、商业、工业和运输部门通过电网供应能源。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the accounting method, please refer to the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities". Different forms of power generation and fuel consumption come from Chapter 3 (Energy Production) and Chapter 6 (Regional Energy Balance Sheet) in the "China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020". The fuel parameters such as low calorific value and carbon content per unit calorific value used to calculate the carbon dioxide emission factor come from the "2019 China Regional Power Grid Carbon Dioxide Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM" and the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emission Accounting Method and Reporting Guide for Power Generation Facilities" 》
核算方法参考《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》。不同形式发电量及燃料用量来自于《中国能源统计年鉴 2020》中的第三章（能源生产） 和第六章（地区能源平衡表）。用于计算二氧化碳排放因子的低位发热量、单位热值含碳量等燃料参数来自于《2019 年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子 OM 计算说明》、《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).
熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data for electricity production, it is important to consider the specific energy mix in the assessment. The carbon emission factor has been calculated based on the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook, and users should reference the 'Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities' for accurate representation. Appropriate consideration should be given to the different forms of power generation and their specific fuel consumption as listed in the China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020 (Chapters 3 and 6). Use fuel parameters from the '2019 China Regional Power Grid CO2 Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM' for accurate CO2 emission factor determination.

在使用此电力生产生命周期评价(LCA)数据时，重要的是要考虑评估中的具体能源组合。碳排放因子是基于2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算的，用户应参照《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》以确保数据的准确表述。应适当考虑《中国能源统计年鉴2020》（第三章和第六章）中列出的不同形式发电及其特定燃料消耗。使用《2019年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子OM计算说明》中的燃料参数来准确确定CO2排放因子。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
